kgcnn.data.cora package¶

Submodules¶

kgcnn.data.cora.cora module¶

kgcnn.data.cora.cora.cora_download_dataset(path, overwrite=False)¶

Download Mutag as zip-file.

Parameters

  • datadir – (str) filepath if empty use user-default path

  • overwrite – (bool) overwrite existing database, default:False

Returns

Filepath

Return type

os.path

kgcnn.data.cora.cora.cora_graph()¶

Load and convert cora citation dataset.

Returns

[A,X,labels]

  • A (sp.csr_matrix): Adjacency matrix.

  • X (sp.csr_matrix): Node features.

  • labels (np.array): Labels.

Return type

list

kgcnn.data.cora.cora.cora_make_grph(loader)¶

Load the cora dataset.

Parameters

loader (dict) – Dictionary from .npz file.

Returns

[A,X,labels]

  • A (sp.csr_matrix): Adjacency matrix.

  • X (sp.csr_matrix): Node features.

  • labels (np.array): Labels.
